codeMarkPlus.defaultLanguage.description: Default language to be used for comments.
codeMarkPlus.isCommentMessageWrapped.des: Determine whether to wrap the comment message with additional formatting or markers.
codeMarkPlus.commentMessagePrefix.descri: Prefix added at the beginning of the comment message.
codeMarkPlus.commentDelimiter.descriptio: Delimiter to separate different elements inside the comment message (e.g., file name, function).
codeMarkPlus.commentMessageSuffix.descri: Suffix added at the end of the comment message.
codeMarkPlus.addEmptyLineBeforeComment.d: Insert an empty line before the comment message for improved readability.
codeMarkPlus.addEmptyLineAfterComment.de: Insert an empty line after the comment message for improved readability.
codeMarkPlus.literalOpen.description: The opening character used to delimit string literals (e.g., double quotes, single quotes, backticks).
codeMarkPlus.literalClose.description: The closing character used to delimit string literals (e.g., double quotes, single quotes, backticks).
codeMarkPlus.useCurrentPosition.descript: Use the current cursor position to insert the comment.
codeMarkPlus.author.description: The author's name for the comment.
codeMarkPlus.highlightActive.description: Enable dynamic highlighting while the editor is active.
codeMarkPlus.highlightRules.color.descri: The background color for the keyword.
codeMarkPlus.highlightRules.bold.descrip: The text style for bold keywords.
codeMarkPlus.highlightRules.italic.descr: The text style for italic keywords.
codeMarkPlus.highlightRules.underline.de: The text style for underlined keywords.
codeMarkPlus.highlightRules.description: List of highlight rules for keywords. Each rule must define a keyword, a background color, and optionally text styles.
Configuration for the decoration applied to special highlight directives (e.g., 'HIGHLIGHT: next line').
codeMarkPlus.customTemplates.language.de: The programming language for which this template applies (e.g., 'javascript', 'python', 'dart').
codeMarkPlus.customTemplates.template.de: The comment message template. Use variables like {{{commentMessagePrefix}}}, {{{commentMessageSuffix}}}, etc. Example: "[// {{{commentMessagePrefix}}} {{{fileName}}} {{{commentMessageSuffix}}}]"
codeMarkPlus.customTemplates.description: Custom comment message templates for different languages. You can define a template per language using available variables (e.g., {{{commentMessagePrefix}}}, {{{commentMessageSuffix}}}, {{{fileName}}}, {{{author}}}).
codeMarkPlus.insertComment.title: Insert comment
